data: PED ONCS Pain Management for Age Less than 6 Months
Do not order this powerplan for age GREATER than or equal to 6 months. Refer to the PED ONCS Pain Management for Age Greater than or Equal to 6 Months Powerplan
Opioids should be used only when the NON-opioid alternatives are likely to be inadequate on their own or are contraindicated
